name: learning-master
author: 김문정 (Derivative work based on Deta Surf by Deta GmbH)
description: AI 기반 학습 노트북 - 모든 지식을 하나로

scripts.build:mwl: npm run build && electron-builder -mwl --config build/electron-builder-config.js --arm64 --x64 --publish always
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --mac --config build/electron-builder-config.js --arm64 --x64 --publish always
scripts.build:mac:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --mac --config build/electron-builder-config.js --x64 --publish always
scripts.build:mac:arm: npm run build && electron-builder --mac --config build/electron-builder-config.js --arm64 --publish always
scripts.build:lin:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config build/electron-builder-config.js --x64 --publish always
scripts.build:lin:arm: npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config build/electron-builder-config.js --arm64 --publish always
scripts.build:win:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --win --config build/electron-builder-config.js --x64 --publish never
